officialTitle: Effect of Intraoperative Dexmedetomidine on Lung Protection Following Thoracic Aorta Surgery With Hypothermic Circulatory Arrest: a Randomized Clinical Trial
inclusionCriteria:
* Patients undergoing thoracic aorta surgery with hypothermic circulatory arrest, over 20-of age
* Must have minimum age of 20 Years
* Must have maximum age of 98 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Unstable vital sign before surgery
* Severe pulmonary disease requiring consistent treatment
* Illiterate
* Pregnancy
